title: Union of Communists of Armenia
text:
Union of Communists of Armenia () was a <a href="communist%20party">communist party</a> in <a href="Armenia">Armenia</a>.
History.
Prior to the <a href="2003%20Armenian%20parliamentary%20election">2003 Armenian parliamentary election</a>, the party formed part of the <a href="Free%20and%20Fair%20Armenia">Free and Fair Armenia</a> electoral bloc together with the <a href="Marxist%20Party%20of%20Armenia">Marxist Party of Armenia</a>. However, the bloc was denied registration on the ground that neither of the two parties had submitted proper registration.
On 7 July the same year, the Union of Communists of Armenia dissolved as party members merged with the <a href="United%20Communist%20Party%20of%20Armenia">United Communist Party of Armenia</a>.
